survey_name: Online Banking Security Features Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users about their satisfaction with the security features provided by their online banking platforms.

questions.question_text: How often do you use your online banking platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use your online banking platform?

questions.question_text: Which security features do you use most frequently when accessing your online banking account? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which security features do you use most frequently when accessing your online banking account? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the security features provided by your online banking platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the security features provided by your online banking platform?

questions.question_text: Have you ever experienced a security breach or unauthorized access to your online banking account?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this sensitive question.

script.question_text: Have you ever experienced a security breach or unauthorized access to your online banking account?

questions.question_text: What additional security features would you like to see implemented in your online banking platform?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question allows respondents to provide free-form feedback.

script.question_text: What additional security features would you like to see implemented in your online banking platform?
